alert.note: Alert for Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Runnels County through 715 PM CDT... At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ballinger, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ballinger, Winters, Hatchel, Benoit, Lake Winters Lake and Ballinger Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west central Texas.
